藩.definition: fence; hedge; (literary) screen; barrier; vassal state; Taiwan pr. [fan2]

藩庫.definition: government repository; state provincial warehouse (esp. during Qing dynasty)

藩鎮.definition: lit. fence town; buffer region (between enemies); Tang dynasty system of provincial administration under a provincial governor 節度使|节度使[jie2 du4 shi3]
